name: Morpheus's Bracelet
description: The armlet, one of the three keys to unlock Morpheus' seal, Is said to be the relic of Morpheus' beloved woman.

description: The armlet, one of the three keys to unlock Morpheus' seal, Is said to be the relic of Morpheus' beloved woman.

name: Morpheus's Hood
description: Headscarf that sealed with the real power of Morpheus. It seems to require several items to break the seal.

name: Morrigane's Helm
description: Headwear that can prove to be the head among the goddesses. It fully shows the impression of the woman's grey radiance.

name: Morroc Adventure Chest
description: Open the box, you will certainly receive some Colorful Shell, with a probability to receive Star Crumb, Parts, Orc Claw, Bloody Rune, Pearl, Gold Sand, Topaz, Pet EXP Potion (S), Pet EXP Potion (M), Pet EXP Potion (L), etc.

name: Morroc Material Pack
description: Morroc Material Pack, in which all kinds of Morroc materials can be found.

name: Mount Chest
description: Designed for lovable RO fans! It offers you a wide range of mounts. Time to show off!

name: Mr. Meow
description: Ding-Dong! Congratulations to Coffee Kitty for being voted Heartbeat High's “Kitty of the Year”! “If there's anything you don't know, you can ask me! And I can also help out with matters of the heart!"

name: Mr. Scream
description: A very weird-looking mask. It looks terrible. It's used for playing tricks.
effect: Stone Curse Resistance ＋30%,For Refining ＋1, Stone Curse Resistance ＋2% (up to 60%)
